subject: Re: perl 5.8.8 install problem
body: 1291 (return) [ ÒHer favorite, (ZenobiaÕs,) Paul of Samosata, seems to have entertained some views of attempting a union between Judaism and Christianity; both parties rejected the unnatural alliance.Ó Hist. of Jews, iii. 175, and Jost. Geschichte der Israeliter, iv. 167. The protection of the severe Zenobia is the only circumstance which may raise a doubt of the notorious immorality of Paul.ÑM.]
